name: EveryDaySmoker
title: Every Day Smoker
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains codes or concepts that identify patients as an every day tobacco smoker.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Assessment, Performed. The intent of this data element is to identify patients as every day tobacco smokers using the result attribute of "Assessment, Performed" assessing the "Frequency of Tobacco Use".),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with SNOMED CT codes identifying daily users of smoking forms of tobacco.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
